spirit:component.spirit:name: ebaz4205_i2s_receiver_0_0

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: specify frequency of the clock connected to port this port

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: specify frequency of the clock connected to port this port

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: FREQ_HZ
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: specify frequency of the clock connected to port this port

spirit:component.spirit:description: I2S Receiver can be used to accept PCM data from an external CODEC for Audio capture. It can support upto 8 channels of PCM data. The IP supports Audio sample size of 16 or 24 bits.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_DWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This is the width of valid data sample. Possible values are 16 and 24.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_32BIT_LR
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select this to enable I2S receive the data with 32 bit SCLK. Valid sample bits is determined by the data width selected
